verses.verse: בְּךָֽ־ be-cha- יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh In thee O LORD חָסִ֑יתִי <WH2620> cha-Si-ti; do I put my trust אַל־ <WH408> 'al- nay אֵב֥וֹשָׁה <WH954> e-Voo-shah be put to confusion לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> le-'o-Lam. In

בְּצִדְקָתְךָ֗ <WH6666> be-tzid-ka-te-Cha, me in thy righteousness תַּצִּילֵ֥נִי <WH5337> tatz-tzi-Le-ni Deliver וּֽתְפַלְּטֵ֑נִי <WH6403> u-te-fal-le-Te-ni; and cause me to escape הַטֵּֽה־ <WH5186> hat-teh- incline אֵלַ֥י <WH413> 'e-Lai about אָ֝זְנְךָ֗ <WH241> 'a-ze-ne-cha, thine ear וְהוֹשִׁיעֵֽנִי׃ <WH3467> ve-ho-shi-'E-ni. unto me and save

[shall be] continually
